civ_dendro: Clusters are formed using complete linkage on the cosine distance between civilisation v civilisation win rates.
Civilisations are coloured based upon their group.
Groups are formed by applying an arbitrary cutoff that ensures there are no more than 8 unique groups.
dist_elo: The mean match Elo is calculated as the mean Elo of all players in the match
dist_map_normal: Play rates have been normalised by scaling the number of games played by 1 divided by

the percentage
of days in which at least 1 game was played on that map
civ_playrate: The red line represents the hypothetical play rate if civs were picked at random
dist_civpick: Only includes %s / %s players who have played more than %s games
slide_wrNaive_elo: Win rates are calculated at each point X after filtering the data to
only include matches where mean Elo is within +- 0.1 percentiles of X.
Win rates have been adjusted for difference in mean Elo.
The error bars represent the 95% confidence interval.
All lines have been smoothed using a GAM.
slide_wrNaive_gamelength: Win rates are calculated at each point X after filtering the data to
only include matches where the game length was within +- 5 in-game minutes of X.
Win rates have been adjusted for difference in mean Elo.
The error bars represent the 95% confidence interval.
All lines have been smoothed using a GAM.
slide_wrNaive_greatergamelength: Win rates are calculated at each point X after filtering the data to only include matches
where the game length was greater than X in-game minutes.
Win rates have been adjusted for difference in mean Elo.
The error bars represent the 95% confidence interval.
All lines have been smoothed using a GAM.
slide_playrate_elo: Play rates are calculated at each point X after filtering the data to
only include matches where mean Elo is within +- 0.1 percentiles of X.
civ_wrNaive: Win rates have been adjusted for difference in mean Elo.
The error bars represent the 95% confidence interval.
The dashed blue lines represent an arbitrary region that could be considered as 'balanced'
civ_wr_bt: Scores have been adjusted for difference in mean Elo.
The error bars represent the 95% confidence interval.
The red line represents the median civilisation score.
The dashed blue lines represent scores that have an expected 45% & 55% win rate vs the median score.
Vikings have been used as the refence civilisation and thus have a score of 0 with no confidence interval.
civ_wr_pr_bt: Scores have been adjusted for difference in mean Elo.
The horizontal red line represents the median civilisation score.
Vikings have been used as the refence civilisation and thus have a score of 0
civ_wrNaive_playrate: Win rates have been adjusted for difference in mean Elo.
civ_wrAvg: Win rates have been calculated as the mean of each separate civ x civ win rate.
Win rates have been adjusted for difference in mean Elo.
The error bars represent the 95% confidence interval.
civ_wrAvg_playrate: Win rates have been calculated as the mean of each separate civ x civ win rate.
Win rates have been adjusted for difference in mean Elo.
civ_ewr_owr_diff: Negative values indicate that a civilisation is 'underestimated'
Positive values indicate that a civilisation is 'overestimated'
Expected win rates are calculated by fitting a robust linear model with
box-cox transformed play rates as the predcitor
The reference lines are arbitrarily set at -2.5 and 2.5 to provide a visual aid
civ_ewr_owr: Expected win rates are calculated by fitting a robust linear model with
box-cox transformed play rates as the predcitor
civ_wr_rank: Win rates have been adjusted for difference in mean Elo.
The error bars represent the 95% confidence interval.
Confidence intervals were calculated by bootstrap resampling
global_elo_time_AVG: Values presented are 10 day rolling averages
The 'all' group does not include games from the Team Empire Wars ladder
Numbers will be underestimated due to ~20% of matches being excluded due to data integrity issues
global_elo_time_NGAME: Values presented are 10 day rolling averages
The 'all' group does not include games from the Team Empire Wars ladder
Numbers will be underestimated due to ~20% of matches being excluded due to data integrity issues
global_elo_time_NPLAYER: Values presented are 10 day rolling averages
The 'all' group does not include games from the Team Empire Wars ladder
Numbers will be underestimated due to ~20% of matches being excluded due to data integrity issues
global_elo_dist_solo: Elo values presented are players most recent Elo scores as of {date_high}
Only players who have played at least one game since {date_low} are included.
global_elo_dist_solo_ew: Elo values presented are players most recent Elo scores as of {date_high}
Only players who have played at least one game since {date_low} are included.
global_elo_dist_team: Elo values presented are players most recent Elo scores as of {date_high}
Only players who have played at least one game since {date_low} are included.
global_elo_games_SOLO: Elo values presented are players most recent Elo scores as of {date_high}
Only matches played in a 45 day period between {date_low} and {date_high} have been included
global_elo_games_SOLO_EW: Elo values presented are players most recent Elo scores as of {date_high}
Only matches played in a 45 day period between {date_low} and {date_high} have been included
global_elo_games_TEAM: Elo values presented are players most recent Elo scores as of {date_high}
Only matches played in a 45 day period between {date_low} and {date_high} have been included
